meanings.definition: Miauls (verb): to make a high-pitched cry like that of a cat
meanings.sent1: The kitten miauls when it wants attention.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat miauls loudly outside my window every night.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled when she heard the cat miauls.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled and the trees miauled in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice miauls beautifully in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: Miauls (noun): a high-pitched cry like that of a cat
meanings.sent1: The miauls of the kittens filled the animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the loud miauls of the neighborhood cats.
meanings.sent3: The miauls of the cat sounded like a tiny opera singer.
meanings.sent4: The miauls of the distant cats echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The eerie miauls of the cats sent shivers down my spine.
